trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Beckley
There were no other sightings in Beckley on or around September 10th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was the scariest think i have ever seen. There was so many of them in the sky i thought we was under a ufo apocolips. They was triangle shaped and they was glowing. We have four or five eye witnesses that live on our street. They was about half a mile up in the sky. we got them on video , on a phone and a video camera.We just pulled in our drive way and my mother said whats that in the sky and thats when we first seen them.We knew it was a ufo when we first seen it.They was just floating and moveing slowely.They went really fast and we lost them. We ran and got the camera and went for it.
Summary: alot of ufos. they was glowing
